text: Spencer Bachus (born December 28, 1947) is an American politician. He served in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1993 to 2015. A member of the Republican Party, he served as chairman of the House Financial Services Committee (2011â€“2013). Bachus was born on December 28, 1947 in Birmingham, Alabama. He graduated in 1969 from Auburn University. In 1972 he graduated from the University of Alabama School of Law. He is married to Linda Bachus. They have five children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Chairman Spencer Bachus Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Birmingham, Alabama Category:Politicians from Birmingham, Alabama Category:United States representatives from Alabama Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Alabama Legislature
title: Spencer Bachus
